adm:managed-object.name: crypto-manager
adm:managed-object.adm:synopsis:
The
provides a common interface for performing compression, decompression, hashing, encryption and other kinds of cryptographic operations.

adm:property.name: digest-algorithm
adm:property.adm:synopsis: Specifies the preferred message digest algorithm for the Directory Server.

adm:none.adm:synopsis: Changes to this property take effect immediately and only affect cryptographic operations performed after the change.

adm:property.name: mac-algorithm
adm:property.adm:synopsis: Specifies the preferred MAC algorithm for the Directory Server.

adm:none.adm:synopsis: Changes to this property take effect immediately but only affect cryptographic operations performed after the change.

adm:property.name: mac-key-length
adm:property.adm:synopsis: Specifies the key length in bits for the preferred MAC algorithm.

adm:none.adm:synopsis: Changes to this property take effect immediately but only affect cryptographic operations performed after the change.

adm:property.name: cipher-transformation
adm:property.adm:synopsis: Specifies the cipher for the Directory Server using the syntax algorithm/mode/padding.
adm:property.adm:description: The full transformation is required: specifying only an algorithm and allowing the cipher provider to supply the default mode and padding is not supported, because there is no guarantee these default values are the same among different implementations. Some cipher algorithms, including RC4 and ARCFOUR, do not have a mode or padding, and hence must be specified using NONE for the mode field and NoPadding for the padding field. For example, RC4/NONE/NoPadding.

adm:none.adm:synopsis: Changes to this property take effect immediately but only affect cryptographic operations performed after the change.

adm:property.name: cipher-key-length
adm:property.adm:synopsis: Specifies the key length in bits for the preferred cipher.

adm:none.adm:synopsis: Changes to this property take effect immediately but only affect cryptographic operations performed after the change.

adm:property.name: key-wrapping-transformation
adm:property.adm:synopsis: The preferred key wrapping transformation for the Directory Server. This value must be the same for all server instances in a replication topology.

adm:none.adm:synopsis: Changes to this property will take effect immediately but will only affect cryptographic operations performed after the change.

adm:property.name: ssl-protocol
adm:property.adm:synopsis: Specifies the names of the SSL protocols that are allowed for use in SSL or TLS communication.

adm:none.adm:synopsis: Changes to this property take effect immediately but only impact new SSL/TLS-based sessions created after the change.

adm:alias.adm:synopsis: Uses the default set of SSL protocols provided by the server's JVM.

adm:property.name: ssl-cipher-suite
adm:property.adm:synopsis: Specifies the names of the SSL cipher suites that are allowed for use in SSL or TLS communication.

adm:none.adm:synopsis: Changes to this property take effect immediately but only impact new SSL/TLS-based sessions created after the change.

adm:alias.adm:synopsis: Uses the default set of SSL cipher suites provided by the server's JVM.

adm:property.name: ssl-encryption
adm:property.adm:synopsis: Specifies whether SSL/TLS is used to provide encrypted communication between two OpenDS server components.

adm:none.adm:synopsis: Changes to this property take effect immediately but only impact new SSL/TLS-based sessions created after the change.
